header.summary: [serializable] Composite data (contains data that can be used for recompilation).

property.summary: [can be null] Raw data of Square70x70Logo.

property.summary: [can be null] Raw data of Square150x150Logo.

property.summary: [can be null] Short name (without extension) of Square150x150Logo.

property.name: Square150x150LogoFormat
property.summary: [can be null] Format of Square150x150Logo. Without dot | ".".

property.name: Square70x70LogoDirectoryPath
property.summary: [can be null][can be empty] Relative path to directory of Square70x70Logo.
